description:
In Grants Pass, Oregon, when the citizens require legal help related to bankruptcy or personal injury, they know they get an honest, candid, caring approach from the attorneys at the law firm of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys. From debt relief to compensation for injuries caused by another, we offer affordable, reasonable fees, the chance to start over with a clean financial slate and freedom from the overwhelming stress of unpaid bills.

Our service area extends through the entire state of Oregon and the Tri-County area of Washington. With over 30,000 cases filed and 30 years of experience, we are confident, highly qualified consumer rights advocates for businesses and individuals. For matters of Chapter 7, Chapter 13, Chapter 12 and Chapter 11 bankruptcy, we come up with creative solutions that work for each individual situation. Protecting our clients from credit harassment from banks, credit unions, mortgage companies, credit reporting agencies and collection agencies is one of the primary goals of our law firm.

Those who have suffered injuries because of a careless choice of another also come to us to obtain adequate compensation for their injuries. We handle personal injury matters, particularly those related to auto accidents, wrongful death, motorcycle accidents, pedestrian accidents, brain injuries, trucking accidents and birth injuries.

Because we know questions and frustrations arise at all times of the day, we answer emails seven days a week, accept credit card payments and offer free initial consultations. The law firm of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys helps those in Grants Pass, Oregon, start over with debt resolution and credit-rebuilding services.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
